s: There are few things in life as ... caramels candy! These traditional treats have a special place in many of our childhoods. When you were younger, you may recall your grandparents stocking up on bulk caramels and keeping them in tins. Each time you'd head to their home, they would let you rummage around and pick a few to enjoy as a treat. It was something you looked forward to time and time again.
